data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Gerry: Ok, so my flight gets into Chicago at 11:30. Can ____ pick ____ up ____ the ____?
Harold: I ____ be ____ to ____ that. Do ____ want ____ stop ____ a ____ dog ____ the ____ home?
Gerry: I ____ that ____ good! I ____ that Chicago is ____ for ____ hot ____!
Harold: We ____ are! Ok, that sounds like a good plan.
data.partBlankContent:
Gerry: Ok, so my flight gets into Chicago at 11:30. Can y__ pick m_ up fr__ the air____?
Harold: I sho___ be ab__ to d_ that. Do y__ want t_ stop f__ a h__ dog o_ the w__ home?
Gerry: I gu___ that sou___ good! I he___ that Chicago is fam___ for i__ hot do__!

data.fullContent: Gerry: Ok, so my flight gets into Chicago at 11:30. Can you pick me up from the airport? Harold: I should be able to do that. Do you want to stop for a hot dog on the way home? Gerry: I guess that sounds good! I heard that Chicago is famous for its hot dogs! Harold: We sure are! Ok, that sounds like a good plan.
data.answer: 盖瑞：好，我的班机11点半到芝加哥。你能去机场接我吗？ 哈洛德：我应该可以。你想在回家的路上停下来吃个热狗吗？ 格里：我想这听起来不错！我听说芝加哥的热狗很有名！ 哈洛德：当然！好吧，听起来是个不错的计划。
